title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-javascript
author: tiddlywiki
name: CodeMirror Mode JavaScript
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Javascript tiddlers (application/javascript) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
